titleStmt.title: A proclamation concerning leases and asserts.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie.,

notesStmt.note: Warning of proposed alterations in leases of royal lands. Cf. STC.
Dates are given according to Lady Day dating.
Dated at end: VVestminster the xvij. day of February, in the second yeere of our reigne ... .
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
